name: assistant-skills-marketplace
description: Templates and tools for building Claude Code Assistant Skills projects. Production-ready skills for project scaffolding, optimization, and branding.

plugins.name: assistant-skills
plugins.description: Complete toolkit for building Claude Code skills. Includes project scaffolding wizard, skill optimizer, and landing page generator. Derived from 40+ production skill implementations.

plugins.name: assistant-builder
plugins.description: Interactive wizard for creating new Assistant Skills projects or adding skills to existing ones. Includes templates for SKILL.md, scripts, tests, and documentation.

plugins.name: skills-optimizer
plugins.description: Audit and optimize skills for token efficiency and progressive disclosure compliance. Analyzes SKILL.md files and provides A-F grades with specific improvement recommendations.

plugins.name: landing-page
plugins.description: Generate professional README landing pages for Assistant Skills projects with consistent branding. Creates hero sections, comparison tables, architecture diagrams, and SVG logos.
